name: Basic Cheese Cake
directions: Blend graham crackers into crumbs and mix with 1 stick margarine
Press into 9/13 or 1 10 in round pan
In separate bowl mix cream cheese with milk and slowly add the sugar and vanilla sugar
Add the eggs one at a time and then add the corn startch
Pour into the crust, Place the cake into a hot water bath
Bake 350  for 1 hr. leave in closed oven for another hour
